import React, { useContext } from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import { books } from '../../data/books'; import { Rating } from '../../Components/Book-slider/Rating'; import "./Book.css" import CartContext from '../../Context/CartContext'; export const Book = () => { const { id } = useParams() const book = books.find(b => b.id == parseInt(id)); useContext(CartContext) return (

{book.title}

By {book.author} (Author)

Price: {book.price} $

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Asperiores tempora ad numquam, sit distinctio molestiae a temporibus iste at enim nostrum consequuntur laudantium perspiciatis earum libero nobis eius dolore quisquam? Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. {book.language}
) }
